code: const getDevServer=()=>{if(typeof window==='undefined'){return{bundleLoadedFromServer:true,fullBundleUrl:'',url:''};}return{bundleLoadedFromServer:true,get fullBundleUrl(){if(document?.currentScript&&'src'in document.currentScript){return document.currentScript.src;}const bundleUrl=new URL(location.href);bundleUrl.searchParams.set('platform','web');return bundleUrl.toString();},url:location.origin+location.pathname};};export default getDevServer;
